name: 三国争雄
description: "Three Kingdoms Chronicle" is a real-time strategy game with a grand map scene based on the true history of the Three Kingdoms. The player can experience the fun of conquering cities, directing the country, and ultimately ending the Three Kingdoms disputes and uniting the world through their own efforts in the simulated historical background of the game!
developers: 石家庄龙游科技有限公司
publishers: 石家庄龙游科技有限公司
